name: vue-material-design-icons
author: Rob Cresswell <robert.cresswell@outlook.com>
description: A collection of material icons as Vue single file components

scripts.build: npm run clean; node build.js && cp material-design-icon.css dist/
scripts.dist: npm run build && cp package.json dist/ && cp README.md dist/ && cp CHANGELOG.md dist/ && cd dist && npm publish
